description: The Lincolnshire road is undergoing safety improvement works following a number of accidents.
title: Public meeting to discuss safety concerns over A1
title_page: Public meeting to discuss safety concerns over A1 in LIncolnshire - BBC News
maintext:
People are being asked for their views about safety on the A1 in Lincolnshire.
The dual carriageway has seen a number of accidents on its southern stretch and safety improvement work is being carried out by National Highways.
Lincolnshire County Council is due to hold a meeting in Marston, near Grantham, on 12 March.
People can also share their views via the council's website.
